trans-unit.source: Specifies the transaction protocol used in flowing transactions.
trans-unit.target: 指定在流动事务中使用的事务处理协议。

trans-unit.source: This class is used together with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> class to specify the desired protocol for flowing transactions.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用连同<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>类来指定流动事务所需的协议。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"></xref> class.
Gets the default value for the transaction protocol.
trans-unit.target: 获取事务处理协议的默认值。

trans-unit.source: For more information on selecting a transaction protocol, see [Enabling Transaction Flow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/31a6bc6a-4ef4-45ba-a753-1efa1a19d917).
trans-unit.target: 有关选择事务处理协议的详细信息，请参阅[启用事务流](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/31a6bc6a-4ef4-45ba-a753-1efa1a19d917)。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"></xref> value that specifies the default transaction protocol to be used in flowing a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效<xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"></xref>值，该值指定在流动事务的使用的默认事务处理协议。

trans-unit.source: Gets the OleTransactions transaction protocol value.
trans-unit.target: 获取 OleTransactions 事务处理协议值。

trans-unit.source: The OleTransactions protocol is useful for scenarios when interoperability with third-party protocol stacks is not a requirement, and the deployer of a service knows in advance that WS-AtomicTransaction is disabled locally or that the existing network topology does not favor the usage of WS-AtomicTransaction.
trans-unit.target: OleTransactions 协议可用于当第三方协议堆栈具有互操作性不是一种要求，并且服务部署人员预先知道 Ws-atomictransaction 的方案本地禁用或者现有网络拓扑不支持使用 Ws-atomictransaction。

trans-unit.source: Gets the WSAtomicTransaction11 transaction protocol value.
trans-unit.target: 获取 WSAtomicTransaction11 事务处理协议值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the WSAtomicTransactionOctober2004 transaction protocol value.
trans-unit.target: 获取 WSAtomicTransactionOctober2004 事务处理协议值。

trans-unit.source: The WS-AtomicTransaction protocol is useful for scenarios when interoperability with third-party protocol stacks is a requirement.
trans-unit.target: Ws-atomictransaction 协议可用于方案要求第三方协议堆栈具有互操作性时。

trans-unit.source: It is also useful as a simple mechanism for testing transaction flow and the two-phase commit protocol using the WS-AT protocol, without interference with the OleTransactions protocol.
trans-unit.target: 它也是有用的简单机制，用于检测事务流和两阶段提交协议使用 WS-AT 协议，且不会干扰 OleTransactions 协议。
